story.name: ANDYSMANCLUB One-to-Ones: Andy Kilburn's Story
story.content: {"_uid":"39f92162-3d6b-4255-bde4-1e313c2c7820","body":[{"_uid":"d725754e-bc8b-428c-9b00-633e1c534e0e","title":"","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Men’s Mental Health and Male Suicide are two of the most stigmatised subjects facing society in 2021, West Yorkshire-based organisation ANDYSMANCLUB have been challenging those stigmas and offering free, peer-to-peer support for men every Monday night since 2016. NHS Electrician Andy Kilburn attended an ANDYSMANCLUB session for the first time in early 2020, he is now helping to facilitate the Dewsbury branch of the club after an inspiring journey.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"“From late 2017, I found myself in a position where a build up across several years of stresses and anxieties had got the better of me. One of the biggest contributing factors to this was how uncomfortable I felt talking to people about my issues and feeling as though I was burdening people. I finally took the step to seek help and following on from some fantastic support from the NHS, I took the decision to attend an ANDYSMANCLUB session for the first time in early 2020.”","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"“At first, I had my reservations about ANDYSMANCLUB. Would anyone care or be able to relate to the issues I mentioned? Would there be a negative atmosphere at the sessions? What are the people like who attend? Within 2 sessions, I realised quickly that any preconceptions I had about ANDYSMANCLUB were false. Being able to speak openly in an anonymous, non-judgmental environment and then pass on my own experiences to men later as a part of the facilitator’s team has been so, so rewarding.”","type":"text"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"To attend an ANDYSMANCLUB session, email ","type":"text"},{"text":"info@andysmanclub.co.uk","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"info@andysmanclub.co.uk","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":"_blank","linktype":"email"}}]},{"text":".","type":"text"}]}]},"component":"centered","background_color":"bg-white"},{"_uid":"2f5efa15-c408-4519-90ef-488ccfcb368e","items":["9bd1cc14-3c8d-4f68-8219-44d5e7ecda04","e9512c4f-078a-4425-a019-dc47dd81ed8c","efa9dbfc-809f-4157-8172-fc262835b6be"],"component":"three-column-cards","custom_label":"","custom_title":"","background_color":"bg-white"}],"meta":{"_uid":"f3ba9e2d-abb3-43b4-b764-4b95aeb1582d","title":"ANDYSMANCLUB One-to-Ones: Andy Kilburn's Story | ANDYSMANCLUB","plugin":"meta-fields","description":"NHS Electrician Andy Kilburn attended an ANDYSMANCLUB session for the first time in early 2020, he is now helping to facilitate the Dewsbury branch of ANDYSMANCLUB."},"component":"news_views","description":"","featured_image":{"id":4953636,"alt":null,"name":"","focus":null,"title":null,"filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/x/d35dfd3531/one-to-ones-andys-story-1500x1000.svg","copyright":null,"fieldtype":"asset"}}

NHS Electrician Andy Kilburn attended an ANDYSMANCLUB session for the first time in early 2020, he is now helping to facilitate the Dewsbury branch of the club after an inspiring journey.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"“From late 2017, I found myself in a position where a build up across several years of stresses and anxieties had got the better of me. One of the biggest contributing factors to this was how uncomfortable I felt talking to people about my issues and feeling as though I was burdening people. I finally took the step to seek help and following on from some fantastic support from the NHS, I took the decision to attend an ANDYSMANCLUB session for the first time in early 2020.”","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"“At first, I had my reservations about ANDYSMANCLUB. Would anyone care or be able to relate to the issues I mentioned? Would there be a negative atmosphere at the sessions? What are the people like who attend? Within 2 sessions, I realised quickly that any preconceptions I had about ANDYSMANCLUB were false. Being able to speak openly in an anonymous, non-judgmental environment and then pass on my own experiences to men later as a part of the facilitator’s team has been so, so rewarding.”","type":"text"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"To attend an ANDYSMANCLUB session, email ","type":"text"},{"text":"info@andysmanclub.co.uk","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"info@andysmanclub.co.uk","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":"_blank","linktype":"email"}}]},{"text":".","type":"text"}]}]},"component":"centered","background_color":"bg-white"},{"_uid":"2f5efa15-c408-4519-90ef-488ccfcb368e","items":["9bd1cc14-3c8d-4f68-8219-44d5e7ecda04","e9512c4f-078a-4425-a019-dc47dd81ed8c","efa9dbfc-809f-4157-8172-fc262835b6be"],"component":"three-column-cards","custom_label":"","custom_title":"","background_color":"bg-white"}],"meta":{"_uid":"f3ba9e2d-abb3-43b4-b764-4b95aeb1582d","title":"ANDYSMANCLUB One-to-Ones: Andy Kilburn's Story | ANDYSMANCLUB","plugin":"meta-fields","description":"NHS Electrician Andy Kilburn attended an ANDYSMANCLUB session for the first time in early 2020, he is now helping to facilitate the Dewsbury branch of ANDYSMANCLUB."},"component":"news_views","description":"","featured_image":{"id":4953636,"alt":null,"name":"","focus":null,"title":null,"filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/x/d35dfd3531/one-to-ones-andys-story-1500x1000.svg","copyright":null,"fieldtype":"asset"}}
